name: Metroidvania Prototype
description:
METROIDVANIA CONTROLS: Best Played with a Controller Left Joystick / A & D - Move left and right Xbox A / Space - Jump Right Trigger / Hold W - Jetpack when mid-air Down on Left Joystick / S - Ground-pound when mid-air Xbox X / J - Shoot Right Bumper / C - Toggle between locked camera and free camera. Change is evident after moving through doors. Xbox Y / R - Reset
TILESET: TILESET AVAILABLE FOR FREE AT https://zapchi.itch.io/metroidvania-tileset
